00011 //: Applies morphological opening operation with given structuring element
00012 //  Applies erosion followed by dilation
00013 // \relatesalso vil_image_view
00014 // \relatesalso vil_structuring_element
00015 inline void vil_binary_opening(const vil_image_view<bool>& src_image,
00016                                vil_image_view<bool>& dest_image,
00017                                const vil_structuring_element& element)
00018 {
00019   vil_image_view<bool> eroded_im;

00021   vil_binary_dilate(eroded_im,dest_image,element);
00022 }
